welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cartagena, where ancient history meets modern charm! Enjoy the city's breathtaking architecture, rich cultural heritage, and vibrant atmosphere as you explore all that this beautiful destination has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Corvera International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Corvera International Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
